conbody.p: In the default view, the Passport Editor is located in the lower centre of the workspace together with two other tabs: Lemmatizer and HTW. It contains the metadata of lemmata. It is divided into different subsections which are organized in tabs inside it. In the case of the Lemma view these tabs are: Main tab, Relations, IDs, Definition, Bibliography, Lemma plus the toolbar.
Clicking opens the Menu (see Common features) containing the following entries:
This function can also be triggered by left-clicking . It transfers the data from a higher level lemma to a lower level (root entry to child entry).
Using this option overwrites passport data if it has already been committed before.
